member.summary: The object type, such as user, tag, etc.

member.name: P:Yammer.Group.Id
member.summary: The ID number for this object. Note that IDs are not unique across all object types: there may be a user and tag with the same numerical ID.

member.name: P:Yammer.Group.FullName
member.summary: Name given to this group.

member.name: P:Yammer.Group.Name
member.summary: Shortened name of this group. Used in references (@salesteam), addressing (to:salesteam), the email address for group updates (salesteam@yammer.com) and the web URL (www.yammer.com/groups/salesteam).

member.name: P:Yammer.Group.Privacy
member.summary: Either public or private, to indicate whether updates are visible to non-members (public) and whether joining requires a group admin's approval (private).

member.summary: The ID number for this object. Note that IDs are not unique across all object types: there may be a user and tag with the same numerical ID.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.GroupId
member.summary: (Optional) When a message is posted into a group, that group's ID will appear here and the group will be available in the references section.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.DirectToId
member.summary: (Optional) When a message is a private 1-to-1 (or "direct") message, this will indicate the intended recipient.

member.summary: The API resource for fetching this object.

member.summary: The URL for viewing this object on the main Yammer website.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.RepliedToId
member.summary: The ID of the message this message is in reply to, if applicable.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.ThreadId
member.summary: The thread in which this message appears.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.Body
member.summary: Message body

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.Attachments
member.summary: A list of attachments for this message.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.MessageType
member.summary: This will be system or update. A system message is automatically generated by the system and describes an action, such as "Kris Gale has joined the Geni network." An update message is a regular message posted by a user such as "Kris Gale: Hi everyone." Put simply, this indicates whether a colon will separate the body of the message from the sender's name in the web interface.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.SenderId
member.summary: The ID of the message's sender.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.SenderType
member.summary: The sender's object type: user or guide. The guide is virtual user that exists in the system to send messages such as the tips and initial welcome message.

member.name: P:Yammer.Message.CreatedAt
member.summary: The time and date this resource was created. This would indicate when a user joined the network or when a message was posted.

member.summary: The object type, such as user, tag, etc.
